PageWidgetPortable.Title: Contratos de compra
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_CN_CONTRATOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>EXISTS(SELECT HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS T WHERE T.TIPO = 1 AND T.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'N')</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/contratos/ContratoCompraForm.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
